Class PoweredDoor

  • java.lang.Object
    • Cell
      • Door
        • PoweredDoor

  • public class PoweredDoor
extends Door
    Characters will be stopped from moving onto a Powered Door tile if it is closed and they do not have enough energy to open it. The PoweredDoor class is a subclass of the abstract Door class.
    Creation Date: 20/11/19.
    Last Modification Date: 4/12/19.
    Version:
    1.4
    Author:
    Timothy Roger (977422), Nihal Goindi (976005)
